titleStmt.title: A suruey of the new religion detecting manie grosse absurdities which it implieth. Set forth by Matthevv Kellison doctor and Professour of Diuinitie. Diuided into eight bookes.
titleStmt.author: Kellison, Matthew.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Laurence Kellam [and S. Foigny], at the signe of the holie Lambe,

notesStmt.note: "All but a1 and a8 printed by Foigny; a1 and a8 found in two different settings, distinguished by a1v reading 'Astum' or 'Actum'"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the holie Lambe
